description: I’m Jonathan Arturo López de la Garza, a passionate creative and results-driven senior software engineer with 8+ years of experience designing and building scalable web and mobile applications using React, Next.js, NestJS, and modern TypeScript stacks. Adept in atomic design, Storybook-driven UIs, and API architecture. Founder of multiple ventures including JG Charcutería and Nos imperii. Passionate about clean code, seamless UX, and pushing the limits of front-end innovation

timeline1.title: Senior Frontend Developer – ArteDigital
timeline1.description: Developed and deployed 6+ scalable apps with advanced A/B testing, Storybook integration, and atomic design.

timeline2.title: Full Stack Developer – Hexaware
timeline2.description: Built reusable boilerplates and improved UI/UX across several React and .NET applications.

timeline3.title: Full Stack Developer – Nos Imperii, Teisense, Calisis
timeline3.description: Created ERP, OEE dashboards, and blockchain apps winning 6+ hackathons for innovation.

timeline4.title: UTC – Associate Degree in IT Engineering
timeline4.description: Completed technical degree with a focus on full stack development and systems design.
